entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 5:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
